QuestData.Title: The Art of Taming
QuestData.Description:
I'm quite surprised to find this beast still alive and kicking. It appears to like you.
Before we finish, you had better learn how to wrangle multiple pets.
I'll give you one last lesson.
QuestData.LogDescription: Learn how to dismiss, tame, and stable pets from Austin Huxworth.
QuestData.RewardText:
Excellent work, $n. There's nothing left for me to teach you.
Gather as many wild beasts as you'd like. Just make sure not to lose focus on the ogres who are trying to kill us.

Objectives.Objective: Use "Dismiss Pet" to temporarily dismiss your current pet
Speak with Austin to summon and tame your new pet
Speak with Austin to learn about pet stables
